Overview¶

Requirements¶

  • Python 3.5, 3.6, 3.7 or 3.8

  • Django (2.0+)

  • django crispy forms

  • django ckeditor

Architecture & Design¶

  • Create post form for creating new posts

  • Authenticated users can delete their posts

  • PostListView to show all posts from new to old

  • PostDetailView to view the details of a single post

  • Every post can be assigned to a tag

django-blog-pkg
